Texts.Chs:
类昆虫的蜜蜂种族。

^orange;食性^reset;：素食性，更喜欢含糖食物

^orange;天赋^reset;:

^orange;增益^reset;:
生命值上限：^green;+15^reset;%，移动速度^green;+10^reset;%，坠落伤害^green;-20^reset;%
抗性：毒素抗性^green;+50^reset;%
免疫：蜂蛰，蜂蜜

^orange;环境^reset;:
增加空中机动性，减少液体中机动性

^orange;武器^reset;:
狙击步枪，自动手枪：伤害^green;+15^reset;%

^red;弱点^reset;:
抗性：火焰抗性^red;-50^reset;%，寒冷抗性^red;-30^reset;%
Texts.Eng:
Insectoid bee-people.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Herbivore, prefers sugary items.

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Health x^green;1.15^reset;, Fall Damage x^green;0.8^reset;, +^green;10^reset;% Speed
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;50^reset;% Poison
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Bee Stings, Honey

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Increased air agility, poor movement in liquid

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Sniper Rifles/Machine Pistols: Damage x^green;1.15^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;50^reset;% Fire, -^red;30^reset;% Ice
